price: Abo (bavuzwe haruguru) ubuturo bwabo ni umuriro, kubera ibyo baronkaga.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
